entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 5:48 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 5:48 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:48 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
